name: Stick together (Svarog00)
description:
Page to be edited

The game was made for fun and GMTK game jam.

Two cute slimes want to be joined together. To achieve that goal they have to overcome ancient cave filled with danger.

=========================

Control: 

WASD - movement

Space - switch slime

Q - toggle co-op mode (arrows - second player movement)

=========================

Svarog00 - Game designer, programmer (discord - Svarog00#7688)

Gravve - Artist (discord - gravve#0638)

Music - maou (https://opengameart.org/content/ancient-door-chiptune)
